cast.overview: The remarkable story of Brazilian racing driver Ayrton Senna, charting his physical and spiritual achievements on the track and off, his quest for perfection, and the mythical status he has since attained, is the subject of Senna, a documentary feature that spans the racing legend's years as an F1 driver, from his opening season in 1984 to his untimely death a decade later.
cast.title: Senna

details.biography: Milton Guirado Theodoro da Silva was a Brazilian entrepreneur and the father of legendary Formula 1 driver Ayrton Senna. Born in São Paulo, Milton was a self-made businessman who initially worked in agriculture and later invested in various business ventures. Known for his supportive yet grounded approach to his son's racing career, Milton played a pivotal role in Ayrton’s early development, providing his first kart and encouraging his passion for motorsports. Milton remained a respected figure in the Senna family’s legacy, particularly through his involvement with the Ayrton Senna Institute, established by Ayrton’s sister, Viviane, to promote education and social development in Brazil. He passed away in São Paulo at the age of 94.
details.name: Milton da Silva
details.place_of_birth: Santana de Parnaíba, São Paulo, Brazil
